DOC.brief_summary: The Study compare treatment Closed Loop ( CL ) system - DreaMed MD-AID standard treatment without computer algorithm decision - SAP therapy 20 child adolescent Type 1 Diabetes ( T1D ) afternoon physical activity . The aim study : - demonstrate use DreaMed MD-AID safe physical activity - investigate risk hypoglycemia among child adolescent T1D afternoon exercise closed-loop control .
DOC.brief_title: Prevention Hypoglycemia After Exercise Using Closed Loop System Children Adolescents With Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: This investigator initiate , single-center , open-label , crossover , randomize , interventional , in-hospital pediatric study , perform University Children 's Hospital , University Medical Center Ljubljana . Study duration 4 week per subject , 6 month overall . The study compare Continuous Glucose Monitoring ( CGM ) base time hypoglycemia intervention arm ( Glucose control use DreaMed MD-AID ) control arm ( Glucose control use SAP ) . Each arm include two exercise day 1 week in-between . Subjects randomly assign participate first intervention arm ( 10 subject ) first control arm ( 10 subject ) . At end first period patient ask participate another , i.e . arm least one week arm . Subjects instruct consume similar diet avoid caffeine , alcohol , physical activity 48 hour exercise day visit . All subject attend clinic six occasion : - Visit 1 : Screening sensor/pump education , detailed physical examination perform , subject meet inclusion/exclusion criterion . - Visit 2 : Baseline assessment DreaMed MD-AID profile , subject perform rest electrocardiography ( ECG ) determination maximal oxygen consumption rate ( VO2max ) cycle ergometer Ganshorn LF8.5G™ Schiller software , BG measurement , end exercise 2 hour exercise .
